context: Aging analysis of gross values by risk category at December 31, 2019 The distribution of trade receivables and contract assets closely follows the distribution of the Company’s sales, see note B1, “Segment information.” The ten largest customers represented 49% (53%) of the total trade receivables and contract assets in 2019.
questions: What does the distribution of trade receivables and contract assets follow?
What is proportion of the 10 largest customers in total trade receivables and contract assets in 2019?
What is the total past due for 2019?
What is the difference in low and medium country risk due for 1-90 days past due?
What is the difference between 1-90 and 91-180 days past due in low risk country?
What is the difference between 181-360 and >360 due for all countries?
